content: for Nancy, sublime: imagination feeling its powerlessness as it touches the limit (limit conceived as height, absolute height)

cela se touche: “it itself touches itself,” “one touches it, it lets itself be touched” > imagination: possibility auto-affecting its essence of a nonessence: it is touched, in a movement de retrait ou de re-pli, becomes at moment it touches untouchable [re: imagination “touching” sublime]
Nancy: sublime occurs on edge of art
acc. Benjamin [theory of revolution], never stock up on apparatus w/out transforming its very structure, twisting it, betraying, attracting it out of its element
Derrida capitalizes ellipsis [?]

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

content: resonances leading you astray, what if I like words in order to be-tray (pour trahir) > (pour traiter, triturer, traîner, tramer, tracer, traquer)
comes very close to analyzing self-referentiality of déjà
[Derrida on 2 hands] > to write one must be several
trait for trait—each stands for all the others: by this fact, never chance left for equivalence
what happens when a surplus value places itself en abyme?

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

content: Derrida yielded to Adami (hooked like a fish [hostage]), as if his angular signature was waiting for me [Derrida], a stupefying advance > it became Derrida's business, made him speak
the phrase “what both cuts me off and prompts me (me souffle) w/ all the rest” performs, does what it says it’s doing: framing borders are jumped, margins saturated en abyme

bait (amorce) for Christic phallus (Ichthys): track, graph or trace (Ichnos) of a voiceless bit (mors), Derrida translates title of Adami’s picture [on Glas] as Ich [I’m exhibiting Ich—as an other] ——Adami’s Glas: double column, double bind (bound by fastener called a spiral)—codicarium? quaternarium?; Glas takes its call from scarcely articulable gl

what is detached from my signature, da, a piece (morceau) of the other’s name, one of the most obsessive motifs in Glas ——plus d’air, plus r [+R]; each letter, especially gl: re-marks the slippery surface, angled word, edge of tomb, hooked (crochue) signature > each letter, bit or piece of word (mors ou morceau de mot) written w/ 2 hands, twice two hands, on each page
what is detached from my signature, da, a piece (morceau) of the other’s name, one of the most obsessive motifs in Glas
“the angle is always for me the edge of a tomb (un bord de tombe)”
polysemia or even dissemination drags Adami’s sentence far from any shore (rive), preventing any event from ever arriving (s’arriver)
each letter [re: Adami’s drawing] has the same arched, slightly in-curved rigidity, supple flexion of an erect phallus—fish btwn life & death

survival movement, arrêt de mort, final trance, sursaut cambré tenu au mors: says “I” (am dead) or hoc est corpus meum > dominant fish, one that bites best, takes from sea a body of scaly writing, homogenous w/ signatory’s initials

gl of “angle”: wild, almost unnarratable event, not a morpheme, close to piercing (trouer) a hole in the arthron [articulation, joint], patch of color in graphesis, the trait in color, a rebel to appeased commerce (regulated exchange of 2 elements [lexical, pictural])

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

content: death dance in fish’s tail (queue) > rhythmos: cadence of writing, undulation of waves

fishing picture, record of a hunt: 2 death drives cross in an X (double diagonal): 1) pushes, attracts, holds down—descending column 2) the other, just as sublime, raises up, asphyxia of the phallus—ascending column
Ich [the painting, but…] can’t be found in Glas; Ich captures/draws to itself a psicultural machination rhythmed by logic of double band (bind) or so-called sheath (gaine) argument
[quoting Glas] Genet’s text is not exhausted by the pocket Derrida cuts, sews, and binds: it was the text [Genet’s] which pierced a hole in the pocket first
[sheath as scales]
rigor/joyous severity of trait, petrifying (médusante) impassivity of line > disjunction works on any equality, unhinges, interrupts, truncates > “integrity in dispersion”

Adami shows what is forbidden to Glas, out of range of its signatory, signs the absolute reverse of a text: monstration, exhibition, exposes the exposition ——can never gather the event together in a spectacle [can draw a double band]

into (over) the bargain (the market) (par-dessus le marché), not au-dessus (above) the market (the lure in which you would again let yourself be caught) > puts in play, or en abyme, the destructive simulacra of surplus value

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

content: Plato: sophistry as line fishing
angle, biting (mordant) into the border
X as Chi, the other scene, Ich, Isch (man)—she, cri
X signs: a crossing privileged by all texts sold under my name [bibliography of Derrida’s use of X]
quotation [Adami] cut out of Glas: outbidding speculating to infinity

force of trait (disjointed forms a work): systasis of powerful ligatures holds, binds, disjecta membra, ladder is a scaffold, a synonym of POTENCE, garroted, bound (pillars, columns, frames, capitals)
X (chiasmus), general intersection of Glas, its beginnings or ends en bandes tordues et écartées, also demiurgic operation in Timaeus [see quote: turn X into 2 circles, split Other from Same]
double échelle (scale, ladder [double column]) hauled par-dessus le cadre, le marche, to dominate the overview
trance or tragedy of Ich, trembler [tréma, treachery, trunks, transpierce, trepannings]
tr as chromatic, color transforms program by leaving law of trait in tact
double ladder, erected, riveted, shackled, never arrives > steps: symbolic of sexual act [no sexual rapport?]

[on a tr spree]: not a formal program, not a material matrix, neither metaphor nor metonymy: a system of traits, this truncated matrix lacks nothing for affecting déjà [Derrida], for inciting to all transferences

this [chromatic] tr, which works inside & outside language, is not logocentrism, not a consecration of analogy, not a hypercratylean theory of language: what’s at stake is violence & the arbitrary > it breaches (fraye) an entirely different body
Benjamin’s deconstruction of the aura (authenticity) of work of art
“left-realism” (codified simplification or politicist stereotype) annuls scientific event, squeezing out thickness of culture, ideological efficacity [opposite of formalism?]
Benjamin: secularization causes indeterminacy of “once only (Einmaligkeit),” once-only of phenomena replaced by once-only of artistic operation (never w/out remainder)
ça (quoi?) aura/marché
Benjamin theorizes that portrait of face is last “ritual religious art” before “technical reproducibility” > disappearance of the subject as art of the cenotaph [?]
ça (quoi?) aura/marché
picture, film, hieroglyph: projection sped up to limit of instantaneity: gestus [Brecht] of interruption, suspense of breaching force, holding metonymic fragments, seized by death

motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

content: ça (quoi?) aura/marché
simulacra of fetishes (fetishism generalized) because classical logics of fetishism opposes fetishized bit (mors) to thing itself (God, original referent, transcendental phallus)
en abyme [of representational reproduction] deports referential naiveté [re: Benjamin, comprise btwn painting/photography]
human features when drawn [by Adami] > only frames or mounts
[re: Adami] detailing of extracts, fragments detachable as signatures (typewriter, pen case, umbrella, spectacles, etc.) > why de-tail [dé-tailler: cut out]?
picking out enlarged detail: indissociable demonstration of cinematographic & psychoanalytical technique > one & the same mutation [via Benjamin?]
cenotaph: empty tomb (kenostaphos)
inimitable ductus of pickpocket [idiom], repeating (transgression must be repeated to begin) > worst, most fatal of villainies: robbery/violation of tombs

contingent can do w/out discourse, a masterpiece can’t do w/out a cartouche (on the market & in itself: if you insist on this distinction) > even when the cartouche remains, is defunct: pas de cartouche, plus de cartouche > what will have been able to do w/out it? never touched, aussi impassible et invulnérable qu’aux harcèlements du trait: c’est peut-être qu’il était déjà dans la tombe, le cartouche
Nancy: epopteia, sight accomplished, consummation of Mystery of Sense Certainty, phallic & cephalic
